Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to enhance your daily experience. I believe it could be incredibly valuable to you, potentially improving various aspects of your life. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase it for $145. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the time and effort we've invested into making it exceptional. I trust that you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
